title: 13 Degrees Below Zero
description: If you're waiting for hell to freeze over, you've waited to long. This SciFi-Horror series seasoned with Steampunk is set in a post apocalyptic future where it doesn't matter what you believe because the New World Order is determined to have their version of the Book of Revelations come true. Four young adults must do much more than face their personal demons as the clock ticks down for the soul of humanityâ€“ they must find their purpose.
author: L.M. Fields
